add_subdirectory(sdl/ EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)

add_subdirectory(clay/)
add_subdirectory(spdlog/)

add_definitions(-DGLM_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL)
add_subdirectory(glm/)
add_subdirectory(glad/)
add_subdirectory(stb/)

set(SDL_INSTALL_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "SDL Install Docs")
set(SDL3_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sdl/include/ PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SPDLOG_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spdlog/include PARENT_SCOPE)
set(CLAY_INCLUDE_ALL_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "Clay examples")
set(CLAY_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/clay)
set(GLM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glm/)
set(GLAD_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glad/include/)
set(STB_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stb/include/)

set(ODEER_VENDORED_INCLUDE ${SDL3_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY} ${SPDLOG_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY} ${CLAY_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY} ${GLM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY} ${GLAD_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY} ${STB_INCLUDE_DIRECTORY} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(ODEER_VENDORED_LIBS SDL3::SDL3 spdlog glm::glm-header-only glad stb PARENT_SCOPE)
